languages.text: {n}Слова рушатся на Маражая, словно удары кузнечного молота, и гримаса безумия на его лице идет трещинами. Облик кровожадного гиганта пробуждает в глубинах его разума древнее желание — выжить любой ценой! Маражай отвечает Ульфару — взбешенным боевым кличем друкари, в котором слышится предвкушение резни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [Тут Маражай пробздится и начнет орать в ответ]
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова рушатся на Маражая, словно удары кузнечного молота, и гримаса безумия на его лице идет трещинами. languages.text: {n}Les mots frappent Marazhai comme autant de coups de marteau, brisant le masque de démence qui déforme son visage. La vue du géant assoiffé de sang réveille en lui un instinct enfoui, primitif : celui de survivre à tout prix ! Marazhai répond en hurlant un cri de guerre drukhari qui évoque l'imminence d'un bain de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mots frappent Marazhai comme autant de coups de marteau, brisant le masque de démence qui déforme son visage. La vue du géant assoiffé de sang réveille en lui un instinct enfoui, primitif : celui de survivre à tout prix ! Marazhai répond en hurlant un cri de guerre drukhari qui évoque l'imminence d'un bain de sang.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}その言葉がハンマーのようにマラズハイを殴りつけ、彼の顔に浮かんでいた狂気の表情がひび割れる。血に飢えた巨人の姿が、どんな犠牲を払ってでも生き残るという彼の中にある古代の本能を呼び覚ました。マラズハイは、殺戮を予感させるデュカーリの荒々しい雄叫びで応戦する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その言葉がハンマーのようにマラズハイを殴りつけ、彼の顔に浮かんでいた狂気の表情がひび割れる。血に飢えた巨人の姿が、どんな犠牲を払ってでも生き残るという彼の中にある古代の本能を呼び覚ました。マラズハイは、殺戮を予感させるデュカーリの荒々しい雄叫びで応戦する。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的话像战锤一样击中了玛拉斋，他脸上疯狂的表情消失了。看到这位嗜血的巨人，他内心的古老本能再度复苏——要不惜一切代价存活下去！玛拉斋发出了黑暗灵族的战斗怒吼，声音中满是对屠杀的渴望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的话像战锤一样击中了玛拉斋，他脸上疯狂的表情消失了。看到这位嗜血的巨人，他内心的古老本能再度复苏——要不惜一切代价存活下去！玛拉斋发出了黑暗灵族的战斗怒吼，声音中满是对屠杀的渴望。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Die Worte treffen Marazhai wie Hammerschläge, und die wahnsinnige Grimasse auf seinem Gesicht bekommt Risse. Der Anblick des blutrünstigen Riesen weckt einen uralten Instinkt in ihm — um jeden Preis zu überleben! Marazhai antwortet mit einem tosenden Kampfschrei der Drukhari, in dem die Vorfreude auf ein Gemetzel liegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Worte treffen Marazhai wie Hammerschläge, und die wahnsinnige Grimasse auf seinem Gesicht bekommt Risse. Der Anblick des blutrünstigen Riesen weckt einen uralten Instinkt in ihm — um jeden Preis zu überleben! Marazhai antwortet mit einem tosenden Kampfschrei der Drukhari, in dem die Vorfreude auf ein Gemetzel liegt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Las palabras golpean a Marazhai con la contundencia de unos martillazos, y la mueca de su expresión desquiciada se resquebraja. La imagen del sanguinario gigante despierta en él un instinto primordial: ¡sobrevivir a toda costa! Marazhai responde profiriendo un grito de guerra que los Drukhari usan en preparación para una matanza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras golpean a Marazhai con la contundencia de unos martillazos, y la mueca de su expresión desquiciada se resquebraja. La imagen del sanguinario gigante despierta en él un instinto primordial: ¡sobrevivir a toda costa! Marazhai responde profiriendo un grito de guerra que los Drukhari usan en preparación para una matanza.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bu sözler üzerine bir çekiç darbesi yemiş gibi oluyor ve yüzündeki delilik maskesi düşmeye başlıyor. Kana susamış devin görüntüsü; içindeki kadim, her ne pahasına olursa olsun hayatta kalma içgüdüsünü uyandırıyor. Marazhai; Drukharilere özgü, katliam beklentisi yaratan, hiddetli bir savaş narasıyla yanıt veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The words slam into Marazhai like hammer strikes, and the mad grimace on his face cracks. The sight of the bloodthirsty giant awakens an ancient instinct within him — to survive at any cost! Marazhai responds with a raging battle cry of the Drukhari that carries anticipation of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sözcükler Marazhai'a bir çekiç darbesi gibi vuruyor ve yüzündeki delice çarpıklık azalıyor. Kana susamış devin görüntüsü, içindeki kadim bir içgüdüyü uyandırıyor: Her ne pahasına olursa olsun hayatta kal! Marazhai, Drukharilere özgü, katliam beklentisiyle dolu, hiddetli bir savaş narasıyla yanıt veriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
